content: HL7 CDA R2.1 IG: Consolidated CDA Templates for Clinical Note (US Realm), DSTU R2.1â€”Vol. 2: Templates...In Table 1, it says that the required sections for a Care Plan are Health Concerns and Goals. On page 83, it says the required sections are Health Concerns and Interventions.
Moving the question to the #C-CDA stream here for better exposure.
